article_title: Mexico's Femsa Turns to Pricing, Cost Controls to Counter Soda Tax
article_text:
MEXICO CITY—Mexican beverage and convenience store conglomerate Fomento Económico Mexicano SAB increased its operating profit during the second quarter despite a weak Mexican economy and new taxes aimed at trimming waistlines.

Femsa, which owns Latin America's biggest bottler of Coca-Cola Co. products as well as the Oxxo convenience-store chain, said Friday that pricing and packaging strategies, together with efforts to contain costs...
